title: Clientcrash in pickscreen
body:
It's the 5th time my client crashes in my promo, yes its only happening in my promos how to fix this?

Description as i start searching for a game solo or duo doesn't matter and someone leaves on the first matchup in pickscreen my client crashes before or after banning i cant click anything i cant lock anything and i even cant close the client, as last pick i have to wait until everyone picked and get kicked then. after i get kicked my client ends in my empty profile: http://prntscr.com/ax29z1 . If repaired my client 3 times and reseted adobe air to factory settings and it dosent work after all. 

If lost 4 promos due to this bug and dont want to loose more.

replies.body: bei mir hat der Neustart des Routers geholfen

Installiere LoL komplett neu.
Die repair Funktion hilft oftmals nicht.

Teste das ganze dann in einem Freien Spiel.

Sollte es dann immer noch nicht funktionieren würde ich die Internetoptionen/Firewalleeinstellungen usw. durchgehen
Danke, wäre auch mein nächster schritt gewesen
